name: Fresh Pear Pie
author: Carol
summary: This is quite a refreshing dessert. Serve plain, or with whipped cream or ice cream.
ingredients: 1 recipe pastry for a 9 inch double crust pie
directions: Preheat oven to 450 degrees F (230 degrees C)
Place a baking sheet on the bottom oven rack
Combine sugar, flour, salt, cinnamon, and lemon zest in mixing bowl
Roll out half the pastry and line a 9-inch pie pan
Arrange pear slices in layers in the pastry-lined pan, sprinkling the sugar mixture over each layer
Dot with butter and sprinkle with lemon juice
Roll out remaining dough for the top crust
Use your finger dipped in a small bowl of water to moisten the rim of the bottom crust
Place top crust over filling, and trim edge using kitchen shears or a sharp paring knife
Fold edge under bottom crust, pressing to seal
Cut slits in top crust to allow steam to escape
Bake in the preheated oven on the baking sheet for 10 minutes
Reduce oven temperature to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C), and bake until crust is golden brown and filling is bubbly, 35 to 40 minutes longer
Allow to cool several hours before serving
